pitrery

Point In Time Recovery tools for PostgreSQL

  • home
  • downloads
  • documentation
  • source code

Downloads

Source code

The source code of releases is available here:

  • tarball: pitrery-1.5.tar.gz
  • PGP signature: pitrery-1.5.tar.gz.asc

RPM

RPM packages of pitrery for RHEL and CentOS 6 are available here:

  • RPM: pitrery-1.5-1.el6.noarch.rpm
  • PGP signature: pitrery-1.5-1.el6.noarch.rpm.asc

Debian

A package of the latest release will be available on the Debian package repository of Dalibo (http://debian.dalibo.org) soon.
